subject: Climate & Environment
title: Fish Behavior in Acidic Water
description: A quick, practical guide to Fish Behavior in Acidic Water.

hook.text: Elevated COâ‚‚ in water doesn't just affect shells. It disrupts how fish smell, hear, and behave.

buildup.text: Lab studies found clownfish in acidified water lost the ability to detect predator scent.

discovery.text: Some fish became bolder and swam toward danger instead of away from it.

twist.text: Acidification may also interfere with fish larvae finding suitable reef habitats to settle.

climax.text: Changes in fish behavior could reduce survival rates across species that billions of people eat.

punchline.text: Acid in the water rewires the brains of the fish that swim in it.

quiz.question: How does acidification affect fish behavior?
options: It disrupts their ability to smell predators and navigate
